input.sentences: i decided to check out our local library .
it is an old building with a lot of books .
they have a hiking trail as well .
i stopped to smell the flowers .
it was a fun time and this is the back of the building .
output.sentences: We decided to visit the local library.
In the library building were a lot of books.
When we left the library we went hiking on the trail nearby.
On our way we stopped to smell the yellow flowers.
We had a fun time exploring this old building on our walk.
